mapper.insert: INSERT INTO D_COMMENT SELECT ROWNUM DECODE(MOD(ROWNUM,3),1,1,2,2,3), '등록자'||LPAD(ROWNUM,3,0), '수정자'||LPAD(ROWNUM,3,0), '내용'||LPAD(ROWNUM,3,0), SYSDATE-ROWNUM/24, SYSDATE-ROWNUM/24 FROM dual CONNECT BY LEVEL <=31
mapper.select: SELECT comseq, seq, user_id as userId, mod_id as modId, comments, TO_CHAR(reg_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as regDt, TO_CHAR(mod_dt,'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') as modDt FROM D_COMMENT WHERE seq = #{seq} ORDER BY reg_dt DESC
